messages.content: What is the purpose of the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
The node allows native usage of ModelScope based Text To Video models in ComfyUI.
How do I get started using the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
Clone the repository, create a text2video folder in the models directory, and download the required models.
Which models are compatible with the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
Models that were converted to A1111 format are compatible.
Where can I find the required models for the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
The provided link leads to the ModelScope and ZeroScope models.
How do I use the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
Provide the path to the ModelScope model and any desired configuration options.
What are some tips for using the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
Use the ResAdapter LoRA for better quality at lower resolutions. Consider using a higher CFG value for better coherence.
What are the TODO items related to the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
Unconditional guidance and ensemble of 1.5 models are currently not implemented.
Where can I find more information about the ComfyUI_ModelScopeT2V node?
The provided text includes attribution links to the ModelScope team and relevant resources.
